price: 50. Bokima epai ya Allah, nazali sólo mokebisi ya polele тропа ye.
arabic: فَفِرُّوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fafirrū ilā al-lahi innī lakum min'hu nadhīrun mubīnun
